{{dcl | num=2 | deprecated=c++98 | removed=c++17 |
void stossc();
}}

Reads one character and advances the input sequence by one character.

@1@ If the input sequence read position is not available, returns {{lc|uflow()}}. Otherwise returns {{c|Traits::to_int_type(*gptr())}}.

@2@ Same as {{v|1}}, but discards the result.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The value of the character pointed to by the ''get pointer'', or {{c|Traits::eof()}} if the read position is not available.
